entry.title: S2I2 workshop at NCSA
entry.summary: Many of us will attend the first S2I2 workshop beginning tomorrow at NCSA in Urbana, Illinois to discuss collaboration the challenges towards growing successful collaborations between HEP and computer science research communities. The workshop agenda can be found [here][http://hep.physics.illinois.edu/hepg/S2I2-HEP-CS-WKSHP/home.html].
entry.content: Many of us will attend the first S2I2 workshop beginning tomorrow at NCSA in Urbana, Illinois to discuss collaboration the challenges towards growing successful collaborations between HEP and computer science research communities.
